name: Idol Days Sim Date
summary:
Idol Days Sim Date is a romantic dating simulation game for girls.

You have 30 days to spend and build relationships with members from the hottest boy band in town. Prepare for your upcoming concert by practicing your guitar skills, earn money by working in shops, and find love among the stars around you.

5 dateable characters, 6 different endings
